#summary What's new in Release 3.7.
#labels Phase-Design

*Not final yet*

  * FormData#applyTo() changed a bit
  * Name of velocity properties file to use can be defined via System-Property now.
  * Standard way for custom configuration via Configuration class and panama.properties file.
  * Name of panama properties file to use can be defined via System-Property.
  * Name of simplelog properties file to use can be defined via System-Property.
  * ConfigReader is deprecated, use Configuration class and panama.properties instead.
  * Context's getParameter, getIntParameter, getLongParameter optionally take a default value now.
